data.title: Cyprus 1989
data.text:
Cyprus 1989/90

First Division Cyprus Cup Second Division Third Division Fourth Division ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 1989/90 Cypriot First Division Final Table ----------- Team Played Won Draw Lost GF GA GD Points 1. APOEL Nicosia 26 18 5 3 46 19 27 41 [Champions] [1990/91 European Cup] ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 2. Omonia Nicosia 26 15 6 5 53 21 32 36 [1990/91 UEFA Cup] ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 3. Pezoporikos Larnaca 26 10 11 5 37 27 10 31 4. Aris Limassol 26 11 8 7 43 31 12 30 5. Apollon Limassol 26 11 7 8 43 28 15 29 6. AEL Limassol 26 8 11 7 31 30 1 27 7. Anorthosis Famagusta 26 10 7 9 20 28 -8 27 8. Enosi Neon Paralimniou 26 7 12 7 40 40 0 26 9. Olympiakos Nicosia 26 6 11 9 32 35 -3 23 10. Nea Salamina Famagusta 26 6 10 10 26 32 -6 22 11. APOP Paphos 26 6 10 10 30 46 -16 22 12. Alki Larnaca 26 6 9 11 27 36 -9 21 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 13. Evagoras Paphos 26 5 9 12 24 41 -17 19 [Relegated] 14. Ethnikos Achna 26 3 4 19 15 53 -38 10 [Relegated] Notes: 2-1-0 points system Rules for classification: 1) Points, 2) Goal differences, 3) Goal for Teams home grounds ------------------ AEL Limassol Tsirion Stadium Alki Larnaca New GSZ Stadium Anorthosis Famagusta Antonis Papadopoulos Stadium APOEL Nicosia Makario Stadium Apollon Limassol Tsirion Stadium APOP Paphos Pafiako Stadium Aris Limassol Tsirion Stadium Ethnikos Achna Dasaki Stadium Enosi Neon Paralimniou Paralimni Stadium Evagoras Paphos Pafiako Stadium Nea Salamina Famagusta Antonis Papadopoulos Stadium Olympiakos Nicosia Old GSP Stadium Omonia Nicosia Makario Stadium Pezoporikos Larnaca New GSZ Stadium ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 1989/90 Cyprus Cup (1) = 1989/90 Cypriot First Division (2) = 1989/90 Cypriot Second Division (3) = 1989/90 Cypriot Third Division (4) = 1989/90 Cypriot Fourth Division First preliminary round (29 November 1989) ----------------------------- 14 clubs from 1989/90 Cypriot Third Division and 28 clubs from 1989/90 Cypriot Fourth Division (9 first of league table of each group the day of draw and best 10th of all groups) participated. The winner was qualifying to the next round. If a match was drawn, extra time was following. If extra time was drawn, there was a replay at the ground of the team who were away for the first game. If the rematch was also drawn, then extra time was following and in the if the match remained drawn after extra time the winner was decided by penalty shootout. Achyronas Liopetriou (4) 2 - 0 Panikos Pourgouridis Lemesou (4) [aet] Adonis Geroskipou (4) 1 - 2 Olympos Xylofagou (4) Adonis Idaliou (3) 0 - 1 ENAN Ayia Napa (4) AEK Katholiki (3) 2 - 1 E.N. TH.O.I. Lakatamias (3) AEK Kythreas (4) 3 - 2 APEAN Ayia Napa (4) Anagennisi Lythrodonta (4) 3 - 2 ASO Ormideia (3) APEP Pelendriou (3) 2 - 2 Livadiakos Livadion (4) [aet] APEY Ypsona (4) 3 - 0 Kentro Neotitas Maroniton (3) Apollon Lympion (3) 5 - 1 ATE PEK Ergaton (4) ASIL Lysi (4) 2 - 2 OXEN Peristeronas (3) [aet] Elia Lythrodonta (4) 1 - 4 Othellos Athienou (3) Ermis Aradippou (3) 6 - 4 Olympos Acheritou (4) Ethnikos Assia (3) 1 - 2 Doxa Devtera (4) Kourion Episkopi (4) 5 - 2 Enosi Kormakiti (4) MEAP Pera Choriou Nisou (4) 1 - 3 Doxa Paliometochou (4) Olimpiada Neapolis (4) 2 - 0 Tsaggaris Peledriou (4) Olympias Frenarou (4) 0 - 1 Fotiakos Frenarou (4) Olympias Lympion (4) 1 - 2 Neos Aionas Trikomou (3) Orfeas Athienou (3) 5 - 0 APEA Akrotiriou (4) PAEEK (3) 2 - 1 Triptolemus Evrychou (4) Rotsidis Mammari (4) 2 - 0 Poseidonas Giolou (4) Replay Livadiakos Livadion (4) 2 - 0 APEP Pelendriou (3) OXEN Peristeronas (3) 3 - 0 ASIL Lysi (4) Second preliminary round ----------------------------- 15 clubs from 1989/90 Cypriot Second Division were added. The winner was qualifying to the next round. If a match was drawn, extra time was following. If extra time was drawn, there was a replay at the ground of the team who were away for the first game. If the rematch was also drawn, then extra time was following and in the if the match remained drawn after extra time the winner was decided by penalty shootout. AEK Katholiki (3) 5 - 0 ENAN Ayia Napa (4) AEK Kythreas (4) 1 - 0 Orfeas Nicosia (2) Akritas Chlorakas (2) 4 - 3 Chalkanoras Idaliou (2) [aet] Anagennisi Deryneia (2) 6 - 0 Olympos Xylofagou (4) Anagennisi Lythrodonta (4) 1 - 1 Neos Aionas Trikomou (3) Apollon Lympion (3) 1 - 0 Doxa Devtera (4) Digenis Akritas Ipsona (2) 2 - 0 Achyronas Liopetriou (4) Digenis Akritas Morphou (2) 0 - 0 PAEEK (3) Doxa Katokopias (2) 5 - 0 Doxa Paliometochou (4) Elpida Xylofagou (2) 3 - 6 Livadiakos Livadion (4) EPA Larnaca (2) 3 - 1 APEP Lemesou (2) Fotiakos Frenarou (4) 4 - 1 Rotsidis Mammari (4) Keravnos Strovolou (2) 3 - 2 Othellos Athienou (3) [aet] Kourion Episkopi (4) 0 - 3 Ethnikos Defteras (2) Olimpiada Neapolis (4) 1 - 2 AEZ Zakakiou (2) Omonia Aradippou (2) 3 - 0 Ermis Aradippou (3) Orfeas Athienou (3) 1 - 0 Onisilos Sotira (2) OXEN Peristeronas (3) 0 - 1 APEY Ypsona (4) Replay Neos Aionas Trikomou (3) 2 - 1 Anagennisi Lythrodonta (4) PAEEK (3) 2 - 1 Digenis Akritas Ipsona (2) The next four rounds were played in a two-legged format, each team playing a home and an away match against their opponent. The team which scored more goals on aggregate, was qualifying to the next round. If the two teams scored the same number of goals on aggregate, then the team which scored more goals away from home was advancing to the next round. If both teams had scored the same number of home and away goals, then extra time was following after the end of the second leg match. If during the extra thirty minutes both teams had managed to score, but they had scored the same number of goals, then the team who scored the away goals was advancing to the next round (i.e. the team which was playing away). If there werenÂ’t scored any goals during extra time, the qualifying team was determined by penalty shootout. First round ----------------------------- 14 clubs from 1989/90 Cypriot First Division were added. First leg AEK Kythreas (4) 1 - 4 Alki Larnaca (1) AEL Limassol (1) 0 - 1 Ethnikos Achna (1) Akritas Chlorakas (2) 4 - 0 Apollon Lympion (3) APOEL Nicosia (1) 6 - 2 Orfeas Athienou (3) Apollon Limassol (1) 0 - 2 Nea Salamina Famagusta (1) Omonia Nicosia (1) 2 - 1 Aris Limassol (1) Second leg Nea Salamina Famagusta (1) 2 - 2 Olympiakos Nicosia (1) Aris Limassol (1) 1 - 1 Omonia Nicosia (1) Final (9 June 1990 - Tsirion Stadium) ----------------------------- Nea Salamina Famagusta 3 - 2 Omonia Nicosia Cupwinner: Nea Salamina Famagusta (qualified to 1990/91 European Cup Winners' Cup) ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 1989/90 Cypriot Second Division Final Table ----------- Team 1.
